Hello Dear 80zforever,

Your collection is truely amazing, I got the Venus In Furs and The Furniture already, thank you very much !!

Here is a list of artists I would like to request from you : 

Naz Nomad And The Nightmares -- Give Daddy The Knife Cindy

The Dukes of Stratosphear - Chips From The Chocolate Fireball

Luxuria -- Unanswerable Lust, Beast Box and all their 12"

any reords by Blue Rondo Ä‚  la Turk and Blue Rondo

I would also like to ask if you remember that Mick Jones of the Clash produced a album for a female vocalist whom I forgot her name at the early 80's ?


Your post recall memories and give me a chance to listen to many records that I never had a chance to, I would seed it as long as I am able to, thank you very much and have a nice day !!

the female vocal who Mick Jones produced was Ellen Foley.  She also starred in the sitcom NIGHT COURT and was the female vocalist on the first BAT OUT OF HELL album by Meat Loaf.

Oh my, surprises comes from unexpected places. Thanks for the Lindy's Party 80z, it was a real pleasant surprise to me. Haven't heard this for quite a while now. I use to have a cassette tape of this. Thanks man.

Rare is almost an understatement of the albums comprising the torrent. Good work uploader. Three bands here that I had not seen in a torrent (compiled or independently) EVER...
Much, much, much appreciated.
